Diagnosis
	1. Transverse colon adenocarcinoma with neuroendocrine features
	Date of diagnosis
	January 2024

	Treatment aim
	Palliative

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	15 Jan 2024 Extended right hemicolectomy

	Chemotherapy
	1. FOLFOX from Feb 2024 - discontinued after 2 cycles due to progression
	2. FOLFIRI + Bevacizumab commenced March 2024

	Clinical studies
	Not eligible

	Current disease status
	Progressive disease in liver, stable lung metastases

	Current issues
	Grade 3 neutropenia, Grade 2 diarrhea

	Summary of consultation
	Reviewed today prior to cycle 4 FOLFIRI/Bevacizumab. Recent CT shows mixed response with reduction in size of largest liver lesion (segment 7, now 4.2cm from 5.8cm) but new satellite lesions. Lung metastases stable. Performance status remains 2. Experiencing ongoing diarrhea grade 2 despite loperamide. Latest bloods show neutropenia (ANC 0.8) requiring GCSF support. CEA rising from 245 to 380.

	Further investigations
	Repeat CT chest/abdomen/pelvis after cycle 6

	Medication prescribed
	Filgrastim 300mcg daily for 5 days

	Follow up
	Next oncology follow up in 2 weeks pre cycle 5

	Required GP actions
	Weekly FBC monitoring

	Summary of information given to patient
	Discussed mixed response to treatment and options for dose modification due to toxicity. Plan to continue at current dose with enhanced supportive care.
